Interface ExternalAccountDAO

  • All Superinterfaces:

    public interface ExternalAccountDAO
extends BaseDAO<ExternalAccount>, InsertableDAO<ExternalAccount>, UpdatableDAO<ExternalAccount>, DeletableDAO<ExternalAccount>

    Lucas Geiss
